question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding REDD+?
1) “REDD+” includes the role of conservation, sustainable management of forests, and enhancement of forest carbon stocks. 
2) It was first negotiated under the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) in 2005.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: REDD+ includes the role of conservation, sustainable management of forests, and enhancement of forest carbon stocks. It was first negotiated under the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) in 2005.
